NAME: Vivek Pandit
ABOUT:
Senior Partner and Global co-leader of McKinsey & Company's Private Equity and Principal Investment Group which is responsible for our client service to leading Private Equity Funds, Sovereign Wealth Funds, Social Impact Investors, Pension Funds and Family Owned Conglomerates. My client work spans Private Equity, Telecom, Media, Technology, Pharmaceutical and Industrial companies. Areas of specialization include strategy, corporate finance, M&A, value creation, business building and exits. In this capacity, I help clients build new and transform existing businesses with a particular focus on rapid growth and shareholder value creation. I help investors originate, transform and successfully exit businesses across emerging and developed Asian markets with a particular emphasis on shareholder value creation. 

I joined McKinsey in our New York office in 2000. Over the course of my career I have worked across offices North American, European and Asian offices. I serve our Asian Operating Committee, Risk Committee and Partner Review Committee. 

I maintain a strong personal interest in education and pediatric healthcare, serving on the Board or as a Trustee at The Doon School, The Aspen Institute (India), Avasara Academy for Girls and St. Judes Cancer Care Centers. 

If you seek career opportunities at McKinsey in the region please contact Bharti Garg at: bharti_garg@mckinsey.com. I apologise in advance for not being able to respond to job requests via inbox.
